column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The bad/ugly: Called in the morning for a reservation
column2: none available. Was told to call again 5:30 PM to get on the list
column3: and was then told it would be a 90 minute wait. Arrived at 6:30 and got some sangria in the bar while we finished our wait. At 7:15
column4: my friend asked the hostess when our name would come up. She said 10-15 more minutes. At 7:45 (over 2 hours of waiting later)
column5: my friend asked again and they said their system wasn't working properly but they had tried to text us. We had to text. They told us it would be another 10-15 minutes as we watched people who arrived after us get seated. At 8 PM
column6: we were finally seated at 2.5 hours of waiting and no apologies. We couldn't possibly enjoy our experience after that.
